content: this is a summary of a legal case that was heard in the district court in ljubljana the case involved two parties one being the plaintiff and the other being the defendant the case lasted for several months from april 20 2015 to march 9 2017 in the final resolution the value of the goods involved was determined to be 98400 eur the defendant has been ordered to pay the plaintiff 33000 eur additionally the plaintiff has been granted the right to move the real estate property involved in the dispute the court made its decision based on specific laws and principles the details of the settlement are confidential and there is no translation available

metadata.cost: Each party bears their own costs
